review: I have been considering buying a streaming device for awhile now.  It only seemed logical to purchase the fire stick since I was already a prime member.  I do enjoy it, with only a few annoyances.1) I sometimes loose connection.  I am going to blame the stick because all other devices in the house are receiving signals.2) Parental control is kind of annoying.  I feel if the program is something that was already purchased or part of prime then you shouldn't have to put in your password every single time.As a mom who is trying to get things done while kids are watching television, I dislike getting interrupted to type in a password.  Just saying.Other than that I recommend it.  The options are endless to make TV your TV.
